Name: Marble Race
About the game: Race through colorful levels filled with obstacles and monsters and claim the best time. Challenge your friends in a 4-way battle arena. Unlock secrets and even build your own levels. A tribute to 'Hamsterball' and 'Marble Madness'. • CONQUER unique and charming levels • AVOID enemies and traps • CHALLENGE your friends in battle arena or co-op. • SUPPORTS multitude of input devices such are gamepads, joysticks, etc. Trailer Music - 'Jumper' by waterflame at Newgrounds Theme Music - 'Be Free' by k-pone at Newgrounds ----------------------------- If you want some help building levels, join our discord server on the community page.
Meta Title: Marble Race: Oct 13, 2018, Elastic Sea and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Marble Race? Check out the release date (Oct 13, 2018), developer insights from Elastic Sea, and a complete game summary.
